HPI 8123 Nissan Skyline GT-R 1992 JTC Series 11th/12th Place Y. Hane/O. Hagiwara

Yukihiro Hane, Osamu Hagiwara, & Shigeki Matsui (replacing Hagiwara in round 4) drove this Kenji HKS Racing Skyline GT-R in 6 of the 8 events in the 1992 JTC Series. Considering Hagiwara's name is on the model it's safe to assume this is not the car that raced in the Suzuka Super Touring Car 500km race. They went on to finish in 11th & 12th place with their best result being a 4th place finish in the season finale Fuji 500km race. It's interesting to note that despite only competing in 1 event, Matsui finished just 3 places behind Hagiwara in 15th overall for the season.
